original_title: Zombie: The Resurrection of Tim Zom
overview: Tim Zom, alias Zombie. Skateboarding rebel without a cause from the south of Rotterdam. Raised in violence and crime, the reckless, long-haired skater tries to earn his way with tricks, flips and the accompanying music. Will his grim past get in the way?
title: Zombie: The Resurrection of Tim Zom
